subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
Bicycles and Bicycling
Testosterone
lead_paragraph: Floyd Landis, who won the 2006 Tour de France but has been accused of doping to do so, held a fund-raiser last night in Brooklyn, answering questions about his legal battle and presenting a synopsis of his defense.
snippet: Floyd Landis, who won the 2006 Tour de France but has been accused of doping to do so, held a fund-raiser last night in Brooklyn, answering questions about his legal battle and presenting a synopsis of his defense.
